about_the_game:
Play as ACTARIUS, the ultimate Spartan warrior as he battles hes way through Hades underworld to be with hes beloved once more...

- A unique and exciting NEW Combat gameplay System created by Xcogames
- Play as ACTARIUS the ultimate SPARTAN warrior in a rich and beautiful story
- Turn your sword into a whip blade with amazing combat enhancements
- Use your CHAKRA like a boomerang on enemies and environmental challenges
- Gorgeous graphics featuring UNITY all NEW 2022 HDRP lighting and Volumetric
- Unique enemies variations different from any other action game ever created
- High Definition graphics matched with Gorgeous Special Effects and a smooth Combat system



STORY:

Actarius and Nikkoli, two of Sparta's most skilled warriors have died today, hand in hand, heart to heart... In one of SPARTA'S most famous battles "The Peloponnesian War" which started around 431 BC, and would eventually leave Sparta as the Dominated power house of the region, though not without it's causalities...

The two warriors fought bravely, side by side, sword to sword, with Actarius doing everything he could to protect he's Beloved LOVER, who he trained himself and cared for more than anything else in this world.

Battling against the full force of the Athenians Army, Sparta's mighty Champions fought bravely to the very end.

And while Nikkoli, the less experienced Warrior, was granted a safe passage to the "Fields of Elysium" - Actarius, who was much more skilled, ended in a much darker fate. For all hes killing through the years on behalf of various factors, the Spartan warrior was declared unfit for a peaceful afterlife, and was thus sent to HADE'S UNDERWORLD, where he would serve as one of Hades soldier's for all of time.

The two lovers were now forever separated...



But as Actarius roamed the demonic land of Hades's Underworld, he came across a small Fairy who was struggling to stay alive... Her name, was FRAYA!

Fraya explained to Actarius that if he could get her into Hade's castle, there lies a magical ORB from her realm that could open a portal to any destination!

Desperate to get back to hes lovers arm, Actarius agrees to help Fraya...

... And just like that, a new Adventure Begins!
